title: AI support copilot that cut response times by 47%
snippet: We designed and deployed a custom support copilot that drafts responses, surfaces relevant docs, and suggests next best actions inside the existing helpdesk.
imageAlt: Dashboard view of AI copilot assisting support team

title: Automated product workflows across 4 internal tools
snippet: We built agents that sync inventory, generate product copy, and alert ops when anomalies are detected across sales channels.

title: Executive AI dashboard for real-time portfolio insights
snippet: We created an AI-assisted analytics layer that lets leaders ask questions in natural language and get chart-ready answers.
meta: From brief to v1 in 8 weeks
imageAlt: Finance dashboard with charts and metrics
